forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and becoming windy. Rain may be heavy late. Low 3C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 75 to 125mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and becoming windy. Rain may be heavy late. Low around 40F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 3 to 5 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Morning high of 4C with temps falling to -5 to -3. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Morning high of 41F with temps falling to near 25. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around -15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 29F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
